block.p: Jamie Lisa Levine, the daughter of Diane and Richard Levine of Upper Saddle River, N.J., was married last evening to Jeremy David Stoler, the son of Francine and Jeffrey Stoler of Marlboro, N.J. Cantor Wayne Siet officiated at the Pleasantdale Chateau in West Orange, N.J.

Mrs. Stoler, 26, is a customer service representative in New York for the International Watch Company, a Swiss manufacturer. She graduated from Skidmore College and received a master's degree in education from New York University. Her father is an owner of ITP Associates, a commercial real estate developer in Upper Saddle River.

Jamie Levine, Jeremy Stoler Jamie Lisa Levine, the daughter of Diane and Richard Levine of Upper Saddle River, N.J., was married last evening to Jeremy David Stoler, the son of Francine and Jeffrey Stoler of Marlboro,N.J. Cantor Wayne Siet officiated at the Pleasantdale Chateau in West Orange, N.J.

Jamie Lisa Levine, the daughter of Diane and Richard Levine of Upper Saddle River, N.J., was married last evening to Jeremy David Stoler, the son of Francine and Jeffrey Stoler of Marlboro, N.J. Cantor Wayne Siet officiated at the Pleasantdale Chateau in West Orange, N.J.

Mrs. Stoler, 26, is a customer service representative in New York for the International Watch Company, a Swiss manufacturer. She graduated from Skidmore College and received a master's degree in education from New York University. Her father is an owner of ITP Associates, a commercial real estate developer in Upper Saddle River.

Mr. Stoler, 27, is a vice president for real estate finance in New York with Nomura Securities, the Japanese brokerage company. He graduated from Emory University. His mother retired as the circulation manager of Hobby Publications, a magazine publisher in Manalapan, N.J. His father is the chief executive of Flatotel, a suite hotel in New York.
